statements: SELECT * FROM production_data_anomalies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM production_data_anomalies WHERE outlier_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, sensor_id, timestamp FROM production_data_anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM production_data_anomalies ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM production_data_anomalies WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM production_data_anomalies WHERE sensor_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, timestamp FROM production_data_anomalies WHERE outlier_status = TRUE
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_anomalies FROM production_data_anomalies GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING total_anomalies > 3
SELECT * FROM production_data_anomalies WHERE outlier_status = FALSE LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM production_data_anomalies
SELECT * FROM anomalies_table;
SELECT id, anomaly_type, timestamp FROM anomalies_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT data_status, id FROM anomalies_table WHERE anomaly_type = 'Network';
SELECT * FROM anomalies_table WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, data_status, anomaly_type FROM anomalies_table ORDER BY data_status ASC;
SELECT * FROM anomalies_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC, data_status ASC
SELECT id, timestamp, data_status FROM anomalies_table WHERE data_status='resolved'
SELECT AVG(id) AS average_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM anomalies_table
SELECT anomaly_type, COUNT(*) AS total_anomalies FROM anomalies_table GROUP BY anomaly_type ORDER BY total_anomalies DESC
SELECT * FROM anomaly_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM anomalies ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT description, type FROM anomalies WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT anomaly_id, location, timestamp FROM detected_anomalies WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT anomaly_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM anomaly_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, type, severity FROM anomalies WHERE severity < 3;
SELECT * FROM anomalies LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, type, severity FROM anomalies WHERE severity > 2;
SELECT anomaly_id, location, timestamp FROM detected_anomalies ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT anomalies.id, anomaly_logs.log_message, anomaly_logs.log_timestamp FROM anomaly_logs JOIN anomalies ON anomalies.id = anomaly_logs.anomaly_id;
SELECT anomalies.id, anomalies.type, anomaly_logs.log_message FROM anomalies LEFT JOIN anomaly_logs ON anomalies.id = anomaly_logs.anomaly_id WHERE anomalies.type = 'Fire';
SELECT id, datetime, product_id, quantity FROM ProductionData;
SELECT * FROM AnomalyDetection WHERE anomaly_type = 'Irregularity';
SELECT id, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM QualityControl ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT production_data_id, anomaly_type FROM AnomalyDetection WHERE anomaly_type LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY production_data_id DESC;
SELECT id, anomaly_id, log_timestamp, logged_by, log_message FROM AnomalyLog WHERE logged_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM ProductionData ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, MAX(quantity) FROM ProductionData GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM QualityControl WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT A.anomaly_type, AD.anomaly_description FROM AnomalyDetection AD INNER JOIN QualityControl QC ON AD.id = QC.anomaly_id AS A
SELECT AL.log_timestamp, AL.logged_by, AL.log_message FROM AnomalyLog AL INNER JOIN AnomalyDetection AD ON AL.anomaly_id = AD.id WHERE AD.anomaly_type = 'Critical'
SELECT * FROM production_data_anomalies ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, anomaly_type, description FROM production_data_anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'Critical'
SELECT * FROM anomaly_clients WHERE client_name LIKE '%Corp%'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM anomaly_products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT * FROM anomaly_locations WHERE region = 'North'
SELECT * FROM production_data_anomalies ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT anomaly_type, description FROM production_data_anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'Network'
SELECT client_id, client_name, last_interaction FROM anomaly_clients WHERE last_interaction >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM anomaly_products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT location_name, region, total_anomalies FROM anomaly_locations WHERE region = 'North'
